markdownRemark.html: On my way from Dinslaken back to Freiburg I got to see one of the buses whose single purpose I can only imagine is the safe transport of the English fan block. We spared neither people nor material to get a photograph of this amazingly labelled vehicle. Very funny indeed!

frontmatter.title: Germany’s prepared for English Football Fans

pageContext.title: Germany’s prepared for English Football Fans
